category: Radio: Human Vacation Plans - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Salut Emma.  L'hiver prochain nous allons partir en vacances.
meaning: Hi Emma. Next winter we are going on vacation.

category: Radio: Human Vacation Plans - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
Radio: Human Vacation Plans - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Nous allons à la montagne pour faire du ski.
meaning: We are going to the mountains to ski.

category: Radio: Human Vacation Plans - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: C'est amusant.  Vous allez voyager avec des amis?
meaning: It's fun. Are you going to travel with friends?

category: Radio: Human Vacation Plans - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui, nous allons voyager avec elles. Et toi? Que fais-tu l'été prochain?
meaning: Yes, we are going to travel with them. And you? What are you doing next summer?

category: Radio: Human Vacation Plans - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Je vais faire de la plongée avec mon frère.
meaning: I am going scuba diving with my brother.

category: Radio: Vacation Plans - Late Nights with Lin
word: Bonjour, je m'appelle Emma. Tous les jours, je prépare mes bagages pour un voyage.
meaning: Hello, my name is Emma. Every day, I prepare my bags for a trip.

category: Radio: Vacation Plans - Late Nights with Lin
word: Nous allons partir la semaine prochaine.

category: Radio: Vacation Plans - Late Nights with Lin
word: Nous allons faire du ski à la montagne.
meaning: We are going to ski in the mountains.

category: Radio: Vacation Plans - Late Nights with Lin
word: J’aime faire du ski en hiver.
meaning: I like to ski in the winter.

category: Radio: Vacation Plans - Late Nights with Lin
word: Cette année, je vais passer mes vacances avec mon ami.
meaning: This year, I'm going to spend my vacation with my friend.

category: Radio: Photos of Past Trips - Lily and Strangers
word: Bonjour je m'appelle Léo. Je vais partir en vacances le mois prochain.
meaning: Hello, my name is Léo. I am going on vacation next month.

category: Radio: Photos of Past Trips - Lily and Strangers
word: Je vais faire de la plongée.
meaning: I am going diving. I have a lot of photos from my previous trips.

category: Radio: Photos of Past Trips - Lily and Strangers
word: J'ai beaucoup de photos de mes voyages précédents.
meaning: Please provide the French text you would like translated.

category: Radio: Photos of Past Trips - Lily and Strangers
word: Cette année, je vais voyager avec mes amis.
meaning: This year, I will travel with my friends.

category: Radio: Photos of Past Trips - Lily and Strangers
word: Nous allons passer du bon temps ensemble.
meaning: We are going to have a good time together.
